          <title>
            <string language="en">Animal traps: A pitfall trap</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierfallen: Eine Gefahrfalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pièges d'animal : Un piège de piège</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Armadilhas do animal: Uma armadilha do 
pitfall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prese dell'animale: Una presa di 
trabocchetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωικές παγίδες: Μια παγίδα παγίδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desvíos del animal: Un desvío de la 
trampa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First in a series of four illustrations showing different kinds of animal traps. This is a pitfall trap.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cover</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
unterschiedliche Arten der Tierfallen zeigen. Dieses ist eine 
Gefahrfalle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord dans une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant différents genres de pièges animaux. C'est un piège 
de piège.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente em uma série de quatro 
ilustrações que mostram tipos diferentes das armadilhas animais. 
Esta é uma armadilha do pitfall.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Primo di una serie di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano i generi differenti di prese animali. Ciò è una presa
di trabocchetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν διαφορετικά είδη ζωικών παγίδων. Αυτό είναι 
μια παγίδα παγίδας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran diversas clases de desvíos animales. Esto es un 
desvío de la trampa.</string>
          </description>
